ideas.title: How X Should Have Ended
ideas.description: Recreating this popular channel format but using AI to create ultra realistic parodies at low cost and quickly.
ideas.notes: Popular channel format - opportunity for AI-powered recreation with realistic visuals

ideas.title: My Musical Story Animated
ideas.description: Instead of 'my story animated' - leverage AI to generate cheap animations, stories AND turn them into copyright-free original musicals.
ideas.notes: Combines AI animation + AI music generation. Differentiator: original musical numbers instead of narration. Lower copyright risk.
